post_text: The next meeting of Kate's Club is Sunday, November 17th at Odyssey. If you know a child or teen who has lost an immediate family member, please tell them about this FREE program.
shared_text:

Cole's Story

Abby's Angels Foundation
October 27, 2019 at 12:26 PM ¬∑

Powerful words shared by a Kate's Club teen member and how much attending Kate's Club has meant to him. Sunday, November 17 is the next Kate's Club Coweta meeting for children/teens K-12th grade held at Odyssey Charter School - Newnan, GA from 4-6pm.
These meeting are also open to families living in counties neighboring Coweta County. Holidays are approaching and can be painful and difficult to navigate. PLEASE SHARE with any family who has a grieving child/teen who can benefit from Kate's Club's free services. Visit katesclub.org or abbysangelsfoundation.org (click on the Kate's Club link) for more information and to complete a registration form. Email 3sisters@abbysangelsfoundation.org for a form or any questions.
